<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: left; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: center; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><b>NOTICE OF ANNUAL MEETING OF </b><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><b>SHAREHOLDER</b><b>S</b></font></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font-family: Times New Roman,Times,serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: 36pt;">We cordially invite you to attend the 2017 Annual Meeting of Shareholders of Digital Power Corporation (&ldquo;<font style="font-family:Times New Roman, Times, serif;font-size:10pt;"><b>DPW</b>&rdquo; or the &ldquo;<b>Company</b>&rdquo;).&nbsp; Our 2017 Annual Meeting will be held on Thursday, December 28, 2017 at 9:00 a.m. PT at our corporate offices located at 48430 Lakeview Blvd, Fremont, California 94538.&nbsp; You will be able to attend the 2017 Annual Meeting and vote by visiting www.proxyvote.com if you are a beneficial owner and at www.investorvote.com/DPW if you are a registered holder.&nbsp; To enter the meeting, you must have your control number that is shown on the proxy card accompanying this Proxy Statement. </font></p>

<p style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: 36pt; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">Details regarding logging onto and attending the meeting over the website and the business to be conducted are described in the Proxy Card included with this Proxy Statement. We have also made available a copy of our 2016 Annual Report with this Proxy Statement. We encourage you to read our Annual Report. It includes our audited financial statements and provides information about our business and products.</font></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: 36pt; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">The purpose of the meeting is:&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="MTAB4" style="width: 100%; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">

			<td style="width: 36pt;">&nbsp;</td>

			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align: top;">
			<p style="text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">To elect the <font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">six (6) director nominees named in the Proxy Statement to hold office until the next annual meeting of shareholders;</font></p>
			</td>
		</tr>

</table>

<p style="margin: 0pt 0pt 0pt 72pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -36pt; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

		</tr>

</table>

<p style="margin: 0pt 0pt 0pt 72pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -36pt; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

			<td style="vertical-align: top;">
			<p style="text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">To approve <font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">the conversion of 10,000 shares of the Company&rsquo;s Series E Preferred Stock into shares of Common Stock in accordance with the Share Exchange Agreement, dated April 28, 2017, in order to comply with the listing rules of the NYSE American;</font></p>
			</td>
		</tr>

</table>

<p style="font-family: Times New Roman,Times,serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: 36pt;"><u><b>HOW TO VOTE</b></u><font style="font-family:Times New Roman, Times, serif;font-size:10pt;"><b>: </b><b>Your vote is important. Whether or not you plan to attend the annual meeting, please vote as soon as possible by either (1) mailing your completed and signed proxy card(s) to Digital Power Corporation, 48430 Lakeview Blvd, Fremont, CA 94538, Attention: Corporate Secretary, (2) calling the toll-free number printed on your proxy card(s) and following the recorded instructions or (3) visiting the website indicated on your proxy card(s) and following the on-line instructions. You may revoke a previously submitted proxy at any time prior to the annual meeting. If you decide to attend the annual meeting and wish to change your proxy vote, you may do so automatically by voting in person at the annual meeting.</b></font></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: center; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><b>DIGITAL POWER CORPORATION</b></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: center; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><b>Telephone:</b><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><b> </b><b>(510) 657-2635</b></font></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: center; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: center; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><b>PROXY STATEMENT</b></font></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: center; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><b>&nbsp;</b></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: center; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><b>FOR THE 201</b><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><b>7</b><b> </b><b>ANNUAL MEETING OF </b><b>SHAREHOLDER</b><b>S</b></font></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: center; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><b>&nbsp;</b></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: center; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><b>TO BE HELD ON</b><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><b> DECEMBER 28</b><b>, 2017</b></font></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: left; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: center; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><b>INFORMATION CONCERNING THE ANNUAL MEETING</b></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><b>&nbsp;</b></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><b>General</b></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: 36pt; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman, Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;">The enclosed proxy is <font style="font-family:Times New Roman, Times, serif;font-size:10pt;">solicited by the Board of Directors (the &ldquo;<b>Board</b>&rdquo;) of Digital Power Corporation (the &ldquo;<b>Company</b>&rdquo; or &ldquo;<b>DPW</b>&rdquo;), for use at the Annual Meeting of the Company&rsquo;s shareholders (the &ldquo;<b>Meeting</b>&rdquo;) to be held on Thursday, December 28, 2017 at 9:00 a.m. PT at our corporate offices located at 48430 Lakeview Blvd, Fremont, California 94538. You will be able to attend the 2017 Annual Meeting and vote by visiting www.proxyvote.com if you are a beneficial owner and at www.investorvote.com/DPW if you are a registered holder. To enter the meeting, you must have your control number that is shown on the proxy card accompanying this Proxy Statement. </font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman, Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:left;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: left; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><b>Action to </b><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><b>be t</b><b>aken u</b><b>nder Proxy</b></font></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: 36pt; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">Unless otherwise directed by the giver of the proxy, the persons named in the form of proxy, namely,<font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"> Amos Kohn, our Chief Executive Officer, and Milton C. &ldquo;Todd&rdquo; Ault, III, our Executive Chairman of the Board, or either one of them who acts, will vote:</font></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: 36pt; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

			<p style="text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&#9679;</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align: top;">
			<p style="text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">FOR <font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">approval of the conversion of a $400,000 Convertible Note convertible into 727,273 shares of Common Stock at $0.55 per share and related Warrants to purchase 666,667 shares of Common Stock at $1.10 per share in accordance with the Convertible Note Purchase Agreement dated August 3, 2017 in order to comply with the listing Rule 713 of the NYSE American;</font></p>
			</td>
		</tr>

</table>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="MTAB24" style="width: 100%; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">

		<tr>
			<td style="width: 36pt;">&nbsp;</td>

			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align: top;">
			<p style="text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">FOR approval of<font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"> the conversion of $880,000 of Convertible Notes convertible into the aggregate of 1,466,667 shares of Common Stock at $0.60 per share and related Warrants to purchase 1,466,667 shares of Common Stock at $0.66 per share in accordance with the Convertible Note Purchase Agreement dated August 10, 2017, in order to comply with listing Rule 713 of the NYSE American;</font></p>
			</td>
		</tr>

</table>

<p style="margin: 0pt 0pt 0pt 54pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<div id="PGBK" style="width: 100%; margin-right: 0pt; margin-left: 0pt;">
<div id="PGNUM" style="width: 100%; text-align: center; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 10pt;">1</div>

<hr style="border: currentColor; border-image: none; width: 100%; height: 2px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); page-break-after: always; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">
<div id="PGHDR" style="width: 100%; text-align: left;">&nbsp;</div>
</div>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: left; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

			<td style="width: 36pt;">&nbsp;</td>

			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align: top;">
			<p style="text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">FOR approval of the <font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">exercisability of (i) warrants to purchase 317,460 shares of Common Stock at an exercise price of $0.01 per share and (ii) options to purchase 1,000,000 shares of Common Stock at an exercise price of $0.65 per share, and the issuance of the shares of Common Stock issuable upon exercise of such warrants and options, in accordance with the Chief Executive Officer&rsquo;s Employment Agreement dated November 30, 2016, as subsequently amended on February 22, 2017, in order to meet listing Rule 711 of the NYSE American;</font></p>
			</td>
		</tr>

</table>

<p style="margin: 0pt 0pt 0pt 36pt; text-align: left; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="MTAB26" style="width: 100%; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">

		<tr>
			<td style="width: 36pt;">&nbsp;</td>
			<td style="width: 18pt; vertical-align: top;">
			<p style="text-align: left; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&#9679;</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align: top;">
			<p style="text-align: left; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">To approve<font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"> the 2017 Stock Incentive Plan; and</font></p>
			</td>
		</tr>

</table>

<p style="margin: 0pt 0pt 0pt 54pt; text-align: left; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="MTAB27" style="width: 100%; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">

		<tr>
			<td style="width: 36pt;">&nbsp;</td>
			<td style="width: 18pt; vertical-align: top;">
			<p style="text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&#9679;</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align: top;">
			<p style="text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">According to their discretion, on the transaction of <font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">such other matters as may properly come before the meeting or any adjournment there.</font></p>
			</td>
		</tr>

</table>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: 36pt; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: 36pt; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">Should<font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"> any nominee named herein for election as a director become unavailable for any reason, it is intended that the persons named in the proxy will vote for the election of such other person in his stead as may be designated by the Board. The Board is not aware of any reason that might cause any nominee to be unavailable.</font></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: 36pt; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: 36pt; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">By submitting your proxy (via the Internet, telephone or mail), you authorize Mr. <font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">Amos Kohn, the Company&rsquo;s Chief Executive Officer, and Mr. Milton C. &ldquo;Todd&rdquo; Ault</font><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">, III, the Company&rsquo;s Executive Chairman of the Board of Directors, to represent you and vote your shares at the meeting in accordance with your instructions. They also may vote your shares to adjourn the meeting and will be authorized to vote your shares at any postponements or adjournments of the meeting.</font></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: 36pt; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">YOUR VOTE IS IMPORTANT. WHETHER OR NOT YOU PLAN TO ATTEND THE MEETING, PLEASE PROMPTLY VOTE YOUR SHARES OVER THE INTERNET, BY TELEPHONE OR BY MAIL.</p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: 36pt; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><b>Who is</b><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><b> Entitled to Vote; Vote Required; Quorum</b></font></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman, Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;">As of the <font style="font-family:Times New Roman, Times, serif;font-size:10pt;">Record Date of November 7, 2017, there were 15,092,393 shares of Common Stock issued and outstanding; 100,000 shares of Series B Convertible Preferred Stock issued and outstanding; 454,986 shares of Series C Convertible Preferred Stock issued and outstanding; 378,776 shares of Series D Convertible Preferred Stock issued and outstanding; and 10,000 shares of Series E Convertible Preferred Stock issued and outstanding; which constitutes all of the outstanding capital stock of the Company. Shareholders are entitled to one vote for each share of Common Stock held by them. The 100,000 shares of Series B Convertible Preferred Stock will, assuming approval of Proposal 4, carry the voting power of</font><font style="font-family:Times New Roman, Times, serif;font-size:10pt;"> </font><font style="font-family:Times New Roman, Times, serif;font-size:10pt;">1,428,571 shares of Common Stock but will not carry any voting rights at the Meeting. The 454,986 shares of Series C Convertible Preferred Stock carry the voting power of</font><font style="font-family:Times New Roman, Times, serif;font-size:10pt;"> </font><font style="font-family:Times New Roman, Times, serif;font-size:10pt;">1,819,944 shares of Common Stock and will be voted on an as converted basis into shares of Common Stock along with the other shareholders of Common Stock. Neither the 378,776 shares of Series D Convertible Preferred Stock nor the 10,000 shares of Series E Convertible Preferred Stock have any voting rights. </font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman, Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:left;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: 36pt; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">A majority<font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"> of the 15,092,393 outstanding shares of Common Stock will constitute a quorum at the Meeting. </font></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: 36pt; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">Brokers holding shares of record for customers generally are not entitled to vote on <font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&ldquo;non-routine&rdquo; matters, unless they receive voting instructions from their customers. As used herein, &ldquo;uninstructed shares&rdquo; means shares held by a broker who has not received such instructions from its customers on a proposal. A &ldquo;broker non-vote&rdquo; occurs when a nominee holding uninstructed shares for a beneficial owner does not vote on a particular proposal because the nominee does not have discretionary voting power with respect to that non-routine matter. In connection with the treatment of abstentions and broker non-votes, all but one of the proposals at this are considered &ldquo;non-routine&rdquo; matters, and brokers are not entitled to vote uninstructed shares with respect to these proposals. Only the proposal to ratify the appointment of Marcum, LLP, as the Company&rsquo;s independent registered public accounting firm, is a routine matter that brokers are entitled to vote upon without receiving instructions.</font></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: left; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<div id="PGBK" style="width: 100%; margin-right: 0pt; margin-left: 0pt;">
<div id="PGNUM" style="width: 100%; text-align: center; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 10pt;">2</div>

<hr style="border: currentColor; border-image: none; width: 100%; height: 2px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); page-break-after: always; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">
<div id="PGHDR" style="width: 100%; text-align: left;">&nbsp;</div>
</div>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: left; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: 36pt; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">Determination of whether a matter specified in the Notice of Annual Meeting of <font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">Shareholders has been approved will be determined as follows:</font></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: 36pt; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="MTAB32" style="width: 100%; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">

		<tr>
			<td style="width: 36pt;">&nbsp;</td>
			<td style="width: 36pt; vertical-align: top;">
			<p style="text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&#9679;</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align: top;">
			<p style="text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">Those persons will be elected directors who receive a plurality of the votes cast at the Meeting in person or by proxy and entitled to vote on the election. Accordingly, abstentions or directions to withhold authority will have no eff<font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">ect on the outcome of the vote;</font></p>
			</td>
		</tr>

</table>

<p style="margin: 0pt 0pt 0pt 72pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -36pt; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="MTAB33" style="width: 100%; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">

		<tr>
			<td style="width: 36pt;">&nbsp;</td>
			<td style="width: 36pt; vertical-align: top;">
			<p style="text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&#9679;</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align: top;">
			<p style="text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">The<font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"> Reincorporation will require the affirmative vote of the holders of a majority of the total outstanding shares as of the record date. Consequently, abstentions will have the effect of a vote against the reincorporation;</font></p>
			</td>
		</tr>

</table>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="MTAB34" style="width: 100%; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">

		<tr>
			<td style="width: 36pt;">&nbsp;</td>
			<td style="width: 36pt; vertical-align: top;">
			<p style="text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&#9679;</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align: top;">
			<p style="text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">A<font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">pproval of the conversion of 378,776 shares of the Company&rsquo;s Series D Preferred Stock into and exercisability of Warrants to purchase up to 1,000,000 shares of Common Stock, each as issued in accordance with the Share Exchange Agreement dated April 28, 2017, in order to comply with listing Rule 712 of the NYSE American, LLC and California law will require the affirmative vote of the holders of a majority of the total outstanding shares as of the record date. Consequently, abstentions will have the effect of a vote against the reincorporation; and</font></p>
			</td>
		</tr>

</table>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="MTAB35" style="width: 100%; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">

		<tr>
			<td style="width: 36pt;">&nbsp;</td>
			<td style="width: 36pt; vertical-align: top;">
			<p style="text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&#9679;</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align: top;">
			<p style="text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">For each other matter specified in the Notice of Annual Meeting of <font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">Shareholders, the affirmative vote of a majority of the shares of Common Stock present at the meeting in person or by proxy and entitled to vote on such matter is required for approval. Abstentions will be considered shares present by proxy and entitled to vote and, therefore, will have the effect of a vote against the matter. Broker non-votes will be considered shares not present for this purpose and will have no effect on the outcome of the vote.</font></p>
			</td>
		</tr>

</table>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: left; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: 36pt; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">Directions to withhold authority to vote for directors, abstentions and broker non-votes will be counted for purposes of determining whether a quorum is present for the Meeting.</font></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: 36pt; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<div id="PGBK" style="width: 100%; margin-right: 0pt; margin-left: 0pt;">
<div id="PGNUM" style="width: 100%; text-align: center; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 10pt;">3</div>

<hr style="border: currentColor; border-image: none; width: 100%; height: 2px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); page-break-after: always; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">
<div id="PGHDR" style="width: 100%; text-align: left;">&nbsp;</div>
</div>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: left; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: center; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><b>QUESTIONS AND ANSWERS ABOUT THESE PROXY MATERIALS AND VOTING</b></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: left; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><b>What is the purpose of the 201<font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">7 Annual Meeting?</font></b></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><b>&nbsp;</b></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">At the <font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">2017 Annual Meeting, the shareholders will be asked:</font></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="MTAB36" style="width: 100%; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">

		<tr>
			<td style="width: 36pt;">&nbsp;</td>
			<td style="width: 36pt; vertical-align: top;">
			<p style="text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">1.</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align: top;">
			<p style="text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">To elect the <font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">six (6) director nominees named in the Proxy Statement to hold office until the next annual meeting of shareholders;</font></p>
			</td>
		</tr>

</table>

<p style="margin: 0pt 0pt 0pt 72pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -36pt; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="MTAB37" style="width: 100%; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">

		<tr>
			<td style="width: 36pt;">&nbsp;</td>
			<td style="width: 36pt; vertical-align: top;">
			<p style="text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">2.</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align: top;">
			<p style="text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">To ratify the appointment of <font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">Marcum, LLP, as the Company&rsquo;s independent registered public accounting firm for the fiscal year ending December 31, 2017;</font></p>
			</td>
		</tr>

</table>

<p style="margin: 0pt 0pt 0pt 72pt; text-align: left; text-indent: -36pt; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="MTAB38" style="width: 100%; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">

		<tr>
			<td style="width: 36pt;">&nbsp;</td>
			<td style="width: 36pt; vertical-align: top;">
			<p style="text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">3.</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align: top;">
			<p style="text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">To approve <font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">the Reincorporation of the Company from California to Delaware and the related name change to DPW Holdings, Inc.; </font></p>
			</td>
		</tr>

</table>

<p style="margin: 0pt 0pt 0pt 72pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -36pt; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="MTAB39" style="width: 100%; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">

		<tr>
			<td style="width: 36pt;">&nbsp;</td>
			<td style="width: 36pt; vertical-align: top;">
			<p style="text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">4.</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align: top;">
			<p style="text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">To approve the <font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">conversion of up to 500,000 shares of the Company&rsquo;s Series B Preferred Stock into shares of Common Stock and the exercisability of warrants to purchase shares of Common Stock, in accordance with the Preferred Stock Purchase Agreement dated March 9, 2017, in order to comply with listing Rule 713 of the NYSE American, LLC; </font></p>
			</td>
		</tr>

</table>

<p style="margin: 0pt 0pt 0pt 72pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -36pt; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="MTAB40" style="width: 100%; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">

		<tr>
			<td style="width: 36pt;">&nbsp;</td>
			<td style="width: 36pt; vertical-align: top;">
			<p style="text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">5.</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align: top;">
			<p style="text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">To approve <font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">the conversion of 378,776 shares of the Company&rsquo;s Series D Preferred Stock and exercisability of warrants to purchase up to 1,000,000 shares of Common Stock, each as issued in accordance with the Share Exchange Agreement dated April 28, 2017, in order to comply with listing Rule 712 of the NYSE American, LLC and California law;</font></p>
			</td>
		</tr>

</table>

<p style="margin: 0pt 0pt 0pt 72pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -36pt; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align: top;">
			<p style="text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">To approve <font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">the conversion of 10,000 shares of the Company&rsquo;s Series E Preferred Stock into shares of Common Stock in accordance with the Share Exchange Agreement, dated April 28, 2017, in order to comply with listing Rule 713 of the NYSE American, LLC;</font></p>
			</td>
		</tr>

			</td>
		</tr>

			</td>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<div id="PGBK" style="width: 100%; margin-right: 0pt; margin-left: 0pt;">
<div id="PGNUM" style="width: 100%; text-align: center; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 10pt;">4</div>

<hr style="border: currentColor; border-image: none; width: 100%; height: 2px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); page-break-after: always; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">
<div id="PGHDR" style="width: 100%; text-align: left;">&nbsp;</div>
</div>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: left; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: left; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><b>Who is entitled to vote?</b></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: 36pt; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">The <font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">Record Date for the meeting is November 7, 2017. Only shareholders of record at the close of business on that date are entitled to vote at the meeting. The only class of stock entitled to be voted at the meeting is our Common stock and Series C Preferred Stock. On the Record Date, there were 15,092,393 shares of Common Stock outstanding; and 454,986 shares of Series C Convertible Preferred Stock issued and outstanding and entitled to vote. Each share of Series C Convertible Preferred is convertible into four shares of Common Stock and will vote on an as converted basis.</font></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: 36pt; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><b>Why am I receiving these materials?</b></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">We<font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"> have sent you these proxy materials because the Board of Digital Power Corporation (sometimes referred to as the &ldquo;<b>Company</b>,&rdquo; &ldquo;<b>DPW</b>,&rdquo; &ldquo;<b>we</b>&rdquo; or &ldquo;<b>us</b>&rdquo;) is soliciting your proxy to vote at the 2017 Annual Meeting of Shareholders. According to our records, you were a shareholder of the Company as of the end of business on November 7, 2017, the Record Date for the Annual Meeting.</font></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">You are invited to vote on the proposals described<font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"> in this proxy statement. </font></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">The Company intends to mail these proxy materials on or about<font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"> November 17, 2017 to all shareholders of record on the Record Date.</font></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><b>&nbsp;</b></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><b>What is included in these materials?</b></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: left; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">These materials include:</p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: 36pt; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="MTAB47" style="width: 100%; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">

		<tr>
			<td style="width: 36pt;">&nbsp;</td>

			<p style="text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&#9679;</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align: top;">
			<p style="text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">this Proxy Statement for the Annual Meeting;</p>
			</td>
		</tr>

</table>

<p style="margin: 0pt 0pt 0pt 72pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align: top;">
			<p style="text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">our Annual Report on Form 10-K for the year ended December 31, 201<font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">6;</font></p>
			</td>

<p style="margin: 0pt 0pt 0pt 72pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

			</td>

</table>

			<td style="vertical-align: top;">

			</td>

<p style="margin: 0pt 0pt 0pt 72pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

		<tr>

			<td style="width: 36pt; vertical-align: top;">

			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align: top;">
			<p style="text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">The 2017 Stock Incentive Plan.</p>
			</td>
		</tr>

</table>

<p style="margin: 0pt 0pt 0pt 36pt; text-align: left; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><b>What</b><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><b> is the proxy card?</b></font></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">The proxy card enables you to appoint <font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">Amos Kohn, our Chief Executive Officer, and Milton C. &ldquo;Todd&rdquo; Ault, III, our Executive Chairman of the Board of Directors, as your representative at the Annual Meeting. By completing and returning a proxy card, you are authorizing these individuals to vote your shares at the Annual Meeting in accordance with your instructions on the proxy card. This way, your shares will be voted whether or not you attend the Annual Meeting.</font></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman, Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;"><b>Can I view </b><font style="font-family:Times New Roman, Times, serif;font-size:10pt;"><b>these proxy materials over the Internet?</b></font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman, Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman, Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">Yes.<font style="font-family:Times New Roman, Times, serif;font-size:10pt;"> The Notice of Meeting, this Proxy Statement and accompanying proxy card, our Annual Report on Form 10-K for the year ended December 31, 2016 and the other documents appended hereto are available at: www.edocumentview.com/DPW.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman, Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman, Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:left;"><b>How do I vote?</b></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman, Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font-family: Times\ New\ Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: justify;">Either (1) mail your completed and signed proxy card(s) to Digital Power Corporation, 48430 Lakeview Blvd, Fremont, CA 94538, Attention: Corporate Secretary, (2) call the toll-free number printed on your proxy card(s) and follow the recorded instructions or (3) visit the website indicated on your proxy card(s) and follow the on-line instructions.<font style="font-family:Times New Roman, Times, serif;font-size:10pt;"> If you are a registered shareholder and attend the meeting, then you may deliver your completed proxy card(s) or vote in person. If your shares are held by your broker or bank, in &ldquo;street name&rdquo;, then&nbsp;you will receive a form from your broker or bank seeking instructions as to how your shares should be voted. If you do not instruct your broker or bank how to vote, then your broker or bank will vote your shares if it has discretionary power to vote on a particular matter.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman, Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:left;">&nbsp;</p>

<div id="PGBK" style="width: 100%; margin-right: 0pt; margin-left: 0pt;">
<div id="PGNUM" style="width: 100%; text-align: center; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 10pt;">5</div>

<hr style="border: currentColor; border-image: none; width: 100%; height: 2px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); page-break-after: always; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">
<div id="PGHDR" style="width: 100%; text-align: left;">&nbsp;</div>
</div>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: left; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: left; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><b>Am I entitled to vote if my shares are held in <font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&ldquo;street name&rdquo;?</font></b></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">If your shares are held by a bank, brokerage firm or other nominee, you are considered the <font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&ldquo;beneficial owner&rdquo; of shares held in &ldquo;street name.&rdquo; If your shares are held in street name, the proxy materials are being made available to you by your bank, brokerage firm or other nominee (the &ldquo;record holder&rdquo;), along with voting instructions. As the beneficial owner, you have the right to direct your record holder how to vote your shares, and the record holder is required to vote your shares in accordance with your instructions. If you do not give instructions to your record holder, it will nevertheless be entitled to vote your shares in its discretion on the ratification of the appointment of the independent registered public accounting firm (Proposal 2), but not on any other proposal. </font></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">As the beneficial owner of shares, you are invited to attend the annual meeting. If you are a beneficial owner, however, you may not vote your shares at the meeting unless you obtain a legal proxy, executed in your favor, from the record holder of your shares.</p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman, Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">You will be able to attend the 2017 Annual Meeting, vote, and submit your questions during the meeting via live webcast by visiting <font style="font-family:Times New Roman, Times, serif;font-size:10pt;">www.proxyvote.com if you are a beneficial owner and hold your shares in &ldquo;street&rdquo; name and at www.investorvote.com/DPW if you are a registered holder. </font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman, Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:left;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: left; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><b>How many shares must be present to hold the meeting?</b></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">A quorum must be present at the meeting for any business to be conducted. The presence at the meeting, in person or by proxy, of the holders of a majority of the shares of <font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">Common Stock outstanding on the Record Date will constitute a quorum. Proxies received but marked as abstentions or treated as broker non-votes will be included in the calculation of the number of shares considered to be present at the meeting.</font></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><b>What if a quorum is not present at the meeting?</b></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">If a quorum is not present or represented at the meeting, the holders of a majority of the shares entitled to vote at the meeting who are present in person or represented by proxy, or the chairman of the meeting, may adjourn the meeting until a quorum is present or represented. The time and place of the adjourned meeting will be announced at the time the adjournment is taken, and no other notice will be given.</p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><b>&nbsp;</b></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><b>Is there a deadline for submitting proxies electronically or by telephone or mail? </b></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">Proxies submitted electronically or <font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">by telephone as described above must be received by 11:59 pm PT on December 27, 2017. Proxies submitted by mail should be received before 9:00 am PT on<b> </b>December 28, 2017.</font></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><b>&nbsp;</b></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><b>Can I revoke my proxy and change my vote</b><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><b>?</b></font></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman, Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">You may change your vote at any time prior to the taking of the vote at the meeting. If you are the s<font style="font-family:Times New Roman, Times, serif;font-size:10pt;">hareholder of record, you may change your vote by (1) granting a new proxy bearing a later date (which automatically revokes the earlier proxy) using any of the methods described above (and until the applicable deadline for each method), (2) providing a written notice of revocation to the Company&rsquo;s CEO at Digital Power Corporation, 48430 Lakeview Blvd., Fremont, California 94538-3158, prior to your shares being voted, or (3) attending the meeting and voting. Attendance at the meeting will not cause your previously granted proxy to be revoked unless you specifically so request. For shares you hold beneficially in street name, you may change your vote by submitting new voting instructions to your broker, bank, trustee or nominee following the instructions they provided, or, if you have obtained a legal proxy from your broker, bank, trustee or nominee giving you the right to vote your shares, by attending the meeting and voting.</font></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: left; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><b>&nbsp;</b></p>

<div id="PGBK" style="width: 100%; margin-right: 0pt; margin-left: 0pt;">
<div id="PGNUM" style="width: 100%; text-align: center; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 10pt;">6</div>

<hr style="border: currentColor; border-image: none; width: 100%; height: 2px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); page-break-after: always; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">
<div id="PGHDR" style="width: 100%; text-align: left;">&nbsp;</div>
</div>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: left; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: left; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><b>Who can participate in the meeting?</b></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">Only s<font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">hareholders eligible to vote or their authorized representatives in possession of a valid control number will be admitted as participants to the meeting. </font></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: left; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><b>&nbsp;</b></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: left; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><b>Will my vote be kept confidential?</b></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">Yes, your vote will be kept confidential and not disclosed to <font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">the Company unless: </font></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="MTAB52" style="width: 100%; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">

		<tr>
			<td style="width: 36pt;">&nbsp;</td>
			<td style="width: 18pt; vertical-align: top;">
			<p style="text-align: left; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&bull;</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align: top;">
			<p style="text-align: left; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">required by law;</p>
			</td>
		</tr>

</table>

<p style="margin: 0pt 0pt 0pt 54pt; text-align: left; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="MTAB53" style="width: 100%; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">

		<tr>
			<td style="width: 36pt;">&nbsp;</td>
			<td style="width: 18pt; vertical-align: top;">
			<p style="text-align: left; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&bull;</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align: top;">
			<p style="text-align: left; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">you expressly request disclosure on your proxy; or</p>
			</td>
		</tr>

</table>

<p style="margin: 0pt 0pt 0pt 54pt; text-align: left; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="MTAB54" style="width: 100%; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">

		<tr>
			<td style="width: 36pt;">&nbsp;</td>
			<td style="width: 18pt; vertical-align: top;">
			<p style="text-align: left; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&bull;</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align: top;">
			<p style="text-align: left; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">there is a proxy contest.</p>
			</td>
		</tr>

</table>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: left; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><b>How does the Board of Directors recommend I vote on the proposals?</b></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">Our Board recommends that you vote <font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">your shares as follows:</font></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: 36pt; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="MTAB55" style="width: 100%; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">

		<tr>
			<td style="width: 36pt;">&nbsp;</td>

			</td>

			<p style="text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&ldquo;<font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><b>FOR</b>&rdquo; the election of each of the six (6) nominees for director;</font></p>
			</td>
		</tr>

			</td>
		</tr>

</table>

<p style="margin: 0pt 0pt 0pt 36pt; text-align: left; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<div id="PGBK" style="width: 100%; margin-right: 0pt; margin-left: 0pt;">
<div id="PGNUM" style="width: 100%; text-align: center; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 10pt;">7</div>

<hr style="border: currentColor; border-image: none; width: 100%; height: 2px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); page-break-after: always; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">
<div id="PGHDR" style="width: 100%; text-align: left;">&nbsp;</div>
</div>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: left; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="MTAB64" style="width: 100%; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">

		<tr>
			<td style="width: 36pt;">&nbsp;</td>
			<td style="width: 18pt; vertical-align: top;">
			<p style="text-align: left; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&bull;</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align: top;">
			<p style="text-align: left; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&ldquo;<font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><b>FOR</b>&rdquo; approval of the adoption of the 2017 Stock Incentive Plan. </font></p>
			</td>
		</tr>

</table>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">Unless you provide other instructions on your proxy card, the persons named as proxy holders on the proxy card will vote in accordance with the recommendations of the Board as set forth in this Proxy Statement.</p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0pt; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: left; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><b>What if I do not specify how my shares are to be voted?</b></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">If you return a signed and dated proxy card without marking any voting selections, your shares will be voted<font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"> in accordance with the Board&rsquo;s recommended votes set forth immediately above, and if any other matter is properly presented at the meeting, your proxy holder (one of the individuals named on your proxy card) will vote your shares using his best judgment.</font></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0pt; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: left; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><b>Will any other business be conducted at the meeting?</b></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">The Company<font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&rsquo;s by-laws require shareholders to give advance notice of any proposal intended to be presented at the meeting. The deadline for this notice has passed and we have not received any such notices. If any other matter properly comes before the shareholders for a vote at the meeting, however, the proxy holders will vote your shares in accordance with their best judgment.</font></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: left; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><b>&nbsp;</b></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><b>How many votes are needed to approve each proposal?</b></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">For the election of <font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">directors, each of the six (6) nominees receiving &ldquo;<b>For</b>&rdquo; votes at the meeting in person or by proxy will be elected. Approval of all other matters requires the favorable vote of a majority of the votes cast on the applicable matter at the Annual Meeting other than the Reincorporation, which require the favorable vote of a majority of the issued and outstanding shares.</font></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><b>&nbsp;</b></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: left; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><b>How will abstentions be treated?</b></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">Abstentions will be treated as shares present for quorum purposes and entitled to vote, and will have the same practical effect as votes against a proposal<font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"> except in the case of the election of directors, in which case an abstention will have no impact. </font></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: left; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><b>What are </b><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><b>&ldquo;</b><b>broker non-votes</b><b>&rdquo;</b><b>?</b></font></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">Broker non-votes occur when a beneficial owner of shares held in <font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&ldquo;street name&rdquo; does not give instructions to the broker or nominee holding the shares as to how to vote on matters deemed &ldquo;non-routine.&rdquo; Generally, if shares are held in street name, the beneficial owner of the shares is entitled to give voting instructions to the broker or nominee holding the shares. If the beneficial owner does not provide voting instructions, the broker or nominee can still vote the shares with respect to matters that are considered to be &ldquo;routine,&rdquo; but not with respect to &ldquo;non-routine&rdquo; matters. Under the rules and interpretations of the New York Stock Exchange, &ldquo;non-routine&rdquo; matters include director elections (whether contested or uncontested) and matters involving a contest or a matter that may substantially affect the rights or privileges of shareholders.</font></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman, Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">In connection with <font style="font-family:Times New Roman, Times, serif;font-size:10pt;">the treatment of abstentions and broker non-votes, the proposals at this meeting to (i) elect directors, (ii) approve a proposed change in corporate domicile from California to Delaware, (iii) approve the issuance of up to 500,000 shares of the Company&rsquo;s Series B Preferred Stock and the issuance of warrants to purchase shares of Common Stock in accordance with the Preferred Stock Purchase Agreement, (iv) approve the issuance of 378,776 shares of the Company&rsquo;s Series D Preferred Stock, (v) approve the issuance of 10,000 shares of the Company&rsquo;s Series E Preferred Stock; (vi) approve the conversion of a $400,000 Convertible Note convertible into 727,273 shares of Common Stock at $0.55 per share and related warrants to purchase 666,667 shares of Common Stock at $1.10 per share; (vii) approve the conversion of $880,000 in the aggregate of Convertible Notes convertible into 1,466,667 shares of Common Stock at $0.60 per share and related warrants to purchase 1,466,667 shares of Common Stock at $0.66; (viii) approve the 2017 Stock Incentive Plan to increase in the number of shares of Common Stock to 2,000,000 shares of Common Stock under the plan; and (ix) approve the issuance of warrants to purchase 317,460 shares and options to purchase 1,000,000 shares in accordance with the Executive Employment Agreement, are considered &ldquo;non-routine&rdquo; matters, and brokers are not entitled to vote uninstructed shares with respect to these proposals. Only the proposal to ratify the appointment of Marcum, LLP, as the Company&rsquo;s independent registered public accounting firm is a routine matter that brokers are entitled to vote shares without receiving instructions.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman, Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:left;">&nbsp;</p>

<div id="PGBK" style="width: 100%; margin-right: 0pt; margin-left: 0pt;">
<div id="PGNUM" style="width: 100%; text-align: center; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 10pt;">8</div>

<hr style="border: currentColor; border-image: none; width: 100%; height: 2px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); page-break-after: always; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">
<div id="PGHDR" style="width: 100%; text-align: left;">&nbsp;</div>
</div>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: left; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">Our election of directors (Proposal No. 1), approval of the <font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">proposed change in corporate domicile from California to Delaware (Proposal No. 3), approval of the conversion of up to 500,000 shares of the Company&rsquo;s Series B Preferred Stock into Common Stock and the issuance of warrants to purchase shares of Common Stock in accordance with the Preferred Stock Purchase Agreement (Proposal No. 4), approval of the conversion of 378,776 shares of the Company&rsquo;s Series D Preferred Stock into Common Stock in accordance with the Share Exchange Agreement (Proposal No. 5), approval of the conversion of up to 10,000 shares of the Company&rsquo;s Series E Preferred Stock into shares of Common Stock in accordance with the Share Exchange Agreement (Proposal No. 6), approval of the conversion of a $400,000 Convertible Note convertible into 727,273 shares of Common Stock at $0.55 per share and related warrants to purchase 666,667 shares of Common Stock at $1.10 per share (Proposal No. 7); approval of the conversion of $880,000 in the aggregate of Convertible Notes convertible into 1,466,667 shares of Common Stock at $0.60 per share and related warrants to purchase 1,466,667 shares of Common Stock at $0.66 (Proposal No. 8); approval of the issuance of warrants to purchase 317,460 shares and options to purchase 1,000,000 shares in accordance with the Executive Employment Agreement (Proposal 9), and approval to adopt the 2017 Stock Incentive Plan (Proposal 10), are considered to be &ldquo;non-routine&rdquo; matters and as a result, brokers or nominees cannot vote your shares on these proposals in the absence of your direction.</font></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: left; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><b>Who is paying for this proxy solicitation?</b></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">We will pay for the entire cost of soliciting proxies. In addition to these mailed proxy materials, our directors and employees may also solicit proxies in person, by telephone or by other means of communication. Directors and employees will not be paid any additional compensation for soliciting proxies but may be reimbursed for out-of-pocket expenses incurred in connection with the solicitation.<font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"> We will also reimburse brokerage firms, banks and other agents for their reasonable out-of-pocket expenses incurred in forwarding proxy materials to beneficial owners.</font></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<div id="PGBK" style="width: 100%; margin-right: 0pt; margin-left: 0pt;">
<div id="PGNUM" style="width: 100%; text-align: center; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 10pt;">9</div>

<hr style="border: currentColor; border-image: none; width: 100%; height: 2px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); page-break-after: always; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">
<div id="PGHDR" style="width: 100%; text-align: left;">&nbsp;</div>
</div>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: left; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><b>What does it mean if I receive more than one set of proxy materials?</b></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">If you receive more than one set of proxy materials, your shares may be registered in more than one name or in different accounts. Please complete, sign and <font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">return each proxy card to ensure that all of your shares are voted.</font></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><b>&nbsp;</b></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><b>I share the same address with another shareholder</b><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><b> of the Company</b><b>. Why has our household only received one set of proxy materials?</b></font></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: left; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">The <font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">Securities and Exchange Commission&rsquo;s (&ldquo;<b>SEC</b><b>&rsquo;</b><b>s</b>&rdquo;) rules permit us to deliver a single set of proxy materials to one address shared by two or more of our shareholders. This practice, known as &ldquo;householding,&rdquo; is intended to reduce the Company&rsquo;s printing and postage costs. We have delivered only one set of proxy materials to shareholders who hold their shares through a bank, broker or other holder of record and share a single address, unless we received contrary instructions from any shareholder at that address. </font></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><b>How can I find out the results of the voting at the Annual Meeting?</b></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">F<font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">inal voting results will be disclosed in a Form 8-K filed after the Annual Meeting.</font></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><b>&nbsp;</b></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><b>Who can help answer my questions?</b></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">You can contact our corporate headquarters, at <font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">Digital Power Corporation, 48430 Lakeview Blvd., Fremont, California 94538-3158, or by sending a letter to Amos Kohn, our Chief Executive Officer, with any questions about the proposal described in this proxy statement or how to execute your vote.</font></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<div id="PGBK" style="width: 100%; margin-right: 0pt; margin-left: 0pt;">
<div id="PGNUM" style="width: 100%; text-align: center; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 10pt;">10</div>

<hr style="border: currentColor; border-image: none; width: 100%; height: 2px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); page-break-after: always; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">
<div id="PGHDR" style="width: 100%; text-align: left;">&nbsp;</div>
</div>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: left; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: center; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><b>PROPOSAL </b><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><b>NO. </b><b>1 </b></font></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: center; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><b>&nbsp;</b></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: center; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><b>ELECTION OF DIRECTORS</b></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: left; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: left; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><b>Information about the Nominees</b></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">At the Annual Meeting, the <font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">shareholders will elect six (6) directors to serve until the next annual meeting of Shareholders or until their respective successors are elected and qualified. In the event any nominee is unable or unwilling to serve as a director at the time of the Annual Meeting, the proxies may be voted for the balance of those nominees named and for any substitute nominee designated by the present Board or the proxy holders to fill such vacancy, or for the balance of the nominees named without nomination of a substitute, or the size of the Board may be reduced in accordance with the Bylaws of the Company. The Board has no reason to believe that any of the persons named below will be unable or unwilling to serve as a nominee or as a director if elected.</font></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: left; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: justify; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">Assuming a quorum is present, the <font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">six (6) nominees receiving the highest number of affirmative votes of shares entitled to be voted for them will be elected as directors of the Company for the ensuing year. Unless marked otherwise, proxies received will be voted &ldquo;FOR&rdquo; the election of each of the eight nominees named below. In the event that additional persons are nominated for election as directors, the proxy holders intend to vote all proxies received by them in such a manner as will ensure the election of as many of the nominees listed below as possible, and, in such event, the specific nominees to be voted for will be determined by the proxy holders. All of the director nominees currently serve as directors.</font></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: left; font-family: Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
